text: “(Izi ndi zomwe takuletsani). Naonso Ayuda tidawaletsa kudya nyama iliyonse yokhala ndi zikhadabu, ndipo ng’ombe ndi mbuzi tidawaletsa kudya mafuta ake kupatula mafuta omwe misana yake yasenza, kapena okhala m’matumbo, kapena omwe asakanikirana ndi mafupa. Tidawalipira izi chifukwa cha machimo awo. Ndithu Ife ndioona (pa zomwe tikunenazi)
